Indicator Name: Cost of an energy sufficient diet
Long definition: The cost to meet average dietary energy requirements (2329 kcal) from the least expensive locally-available starchy staple, per capita, per day (2017 USD)
Source: Herforth, A., Bai, Y., Venkat, A., Mahrt, K., Ebel, A. & Masters, W.A. 2020. Cost and affordability of healthy diets across and within countries.
